# Research interests
\vspace{-10pt}
\rule{1\linewidth}{\linethickness}

**Cultural/cognitive sociology and inequalities**: meritocracy, individualism, and social status; boundary-making processes; embodied beliefs, with particular attention to processes of information encoding and storage of multi-sensory and linguistic stimuli.\

**Media theories and effects**: media entertainment; resonance theory; music effects on adolescents' beliefs.\

**Advanced quantitative research methods**: computational social science methods, including statistical inference in networks (ERGM), text as data (structural topic modeling, scaling methods); structural equation modeling; multilevel analysis.
